**Introduction**

Here is an article using the `use`, `import`, and `make_project` packages

**Descriptions**

Use the `import` function to import a dataset.

The `make_project` turns takes a project name and creates a package. The function creates files and subdirectories for the project. This function will also create a RStudio Project and use git.

The `use` function takes a package and prompts the user if they want that package installed. If so the package will install.

```{r setup,eval=FALSE}
library(dsproject)
import(mydata.spss)
make_project(myproject)
use(myproject)
```
